American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed LHP Scott Scheoneweis on the 15-day disabled list. Actived RHP Tim Belcher from the 60-day disabled list. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed OF Rich Amaral on the 15-day disabled list. Called up OF Luis Matos from Bowie of the Eastern League. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Signed SS Michael Morse and 2B John Lackaff. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Named Allard Baird general manager. Promoted Herk Robinson to chief operating officer.

MINNESOTA TWINS--Optioned C Matthew LeCroy to New Britain of the Eastern League and RHP Sean Bergman to Salt Lake of the Pacific Coast League. NEW YORK YANKEES--Called up RHP Jake Westbrook from Columbus of the International League. Optioned RHP Darrell Einertson to Columbus. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed RHP Omar Olivares on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Luis Viscaino from Sacramento of the Pacific Coast League. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed OF Greg Vaughn on the 15-day disabled list.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Activated INF Jose Nieves from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF Chad Meyers to Iowa of the Pacific Coast League. COLORADO ROCKIES--Designated C Jason Dewey and INF Adam Ledesma for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Traded C Adam Melhuse to Colorado for a player to be named. Activated 3B Adrian Beltre from the 15-day disabled list. MONTREAL EXPOS--Optioned RHP Guillermo Mota to Ottawa of the International League. Designated LHP David Moraga and RHP Matt Skrmetta for assignment. Recalled RHP Brad Rigby and LHP Scott Forster from Ottawa. Signed RHP Julio Santana.
